content:encoded:
Topics: Career, Counseling, Drug Addiction, Christian Walk, Dating, Transgender
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Sheri Keffer, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris

Caller Questions:

  1. I want to do what you do! Do you have any advice on what path I should take to be a therapist? 
  2. As a recovering alcoholic, what do I tell my adult son when his church friends tell him he only needs God and not AA? 
  3. Will I lose my salvation for dating a transgender woman? 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love
How We Love Our Kids
Is This The One

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
